attributes.action: Prompt the PM to put a target to cut greenhouse gas emissions to zero into law.
attributes.additional_details:
Climate change, interesting one. The President of the USA, Donald Trump doesn't believe in it, personally I do. The article that I read is at the following link:- https://www.itv.com/news/2019-05-31/scientists-call-on-pm-to-bring-in-net-zero-greenhouse-gas-target/?fbclid=IwAR19gMwEZPwro19vOxCSQ7z-vAizqHwBHeeyU-VEbLxv0bxLAIk-T-ozt38
A 'Google' search gives about 771,000,000 results (where as Brexit gives about 396,000,000 results).
attributes.background: Moved by the early morning news of leading climate scientists encouraging the Prime Minister to put into law a target to cut greenhouse emissions to zero, prompted me to put on social media that there needed to be a petition. A reply stated that I should start one.

rejection.details:
The House of Commons recently passed a law to set a net zero greenhouse gas emissions target. We're not sure what further action you would like taken.

You can read the debate here:

https://hansard.parliament.uk/commons/2019-06-24/debates/28C238E5-2CA0-421C-AE98-B2588C102CB0/ClimateChange
